s0202: Moreover heaven earth as furnace, creation as artisan;
s0203: Yin yang as charcoal, myriad things as copper.
s0204: Combine disperse wax wane, how have constant rule;
s0205: Thousand changes ten thousand transformations, not begun have extreme.
s0206: Suddenly become human, what sufficient control grasp;
s0207: Transform become different thing, again what sufficient worry!
s0208: Small knowledge self-private, belittle others value self;
s0209: Greatly connected great view, things nothing cannot.
s0210: Greedy man risk wealth, fierce scholars risk name;
s0211: Boasters die for power, common people rely on life.
s0212: Urged pressed followers, or hurry west east;
s0213: Great man not bent, hundred million changes same together.
s0214: Constrained scholar tied customs, entangled like prisoner restrained;
s0215: Perfect man abandons things, alone with way together.
s0216: Crowd confused confused, good evil accumulate intention;
s0217: True person indifferent indifferent, alone with way rest.
s0218: Release knowledge abandon form, transcend self-forget;
s0219: Vast empty sudden wild, with way soar fly.
s0220: Ride current then go, obtain shore then stop;
s0221: Release body entrust fate, not private with self.
s0222: His life like float, his death like rest;
s0223: Indifferent like deep abyss quiet, broad like untied boat.
s0224: Not because life self-treasure, nourish emptiness float;
s0225: Virtue man no burden, know fate not worry.
s0226: Small matters far distant, what sufficient doubt!
s0227: Later year plus, Jia Sheng summoned seen.
s0228: Filial Wen emperor just received li, sat Xuanshi.
s0229: Above thus sensed ghosts spirits affairs, asked ghosts spirits foundation.
s0230: Jia Sheng thus completely spoke its so condition.
s0231: To midnight, Wen emperor advanced mat.
s0232: Having finished, said: 'I long not see Jia Sheng, self-considered surpassed him, now cannot match.'
s0233: Dwelt moment, appointed Jia Sheng as Liang Huai King tutor.
s0234: Liang Huai King, Wen emperor young son, loved, and liked books, thus commanded Jia Sheng tutor him.
s0235: Wen emperor again enfeoffed Huainan Li Wang sons four people all as marquises.
s0236: Jia Sheng advised, considered calamity rise from this.
s0237: Jia Sheng several times submitted memorials, spoke various marquises connected several commanderies, not ancient system, can gradually reduce them.
s0239: Dwelt several years, Huai Wang rode, fell horse died, no posterity.
s0240: Jia Sheng self-injured as tutor without achievement, wept year plus, also died.
s0241: Jia Sheng death time age thirty-three.
s0242: When Filial Wen collapsed, Filial Wu emperor ascended, promoted Jia Sheng grandsons two to commandery governors, Jia Jia most liked learning, inherited family, with me exchanged letters.
s0243: To Filial Zhao time, listed as nine ministers.
s0244: Grand Historian says: I read 'Li Sao', 'Tian Wen', 'Zhao Hun', 'Ai Ying', sorrowful his ambition.
s0245: Passed Changsha, viewed Qu Yuan self-drowned abyss, never not shed tears, imagined saw his person.
s0246: When saw Jia Sheng mourn him, again strange Qu Yuan with his talent, traveled feudal lords, what state not contain, yet self made like this.
s0247: Read 'Fu Niao' rhapsody, same death life, light depart stay, again clearly self-lost.
